comments:
when the archivesFormat parameter to the eclipse.buildScript task is missing a
NPE during build is thrown (see below). However, when specifying the
archivesFormat the build script cannot be used with Eclipse 3.0 anymore (we have
a build setup that compiles our plugins for both 3.0 and 3.1 with version
specific extensions). Maybe there could be a reasonable default for the
archivesProperty so no NPE occurs (e.g. "*,*,*-antZip")
